00031 class RandomInitialization
00032 {
00033  public:
00034   // Empty constructor required for the InitializeRule template
00035   RandomInitialization() { }
00036 
00037   inline static void Initialize(const arma::mat& V,
00038                                 const size_t r,
00039                                 arma::mat& W,
00040                                 arma::mat& H)
00041   {
00042     // Simple implementation (left in the header file due to its simplicity).
00043     size_t n = V.n_rows;
00044     size_t m = V.n_cols;
00045 
00046     // Intialize to random values.
00047     W.randu(n, r);
00048     H.randu(r, m);
00049   }
00050 };
00051 
00052 }; // namespace nmf
00053 }; // namespace mlpack
